thread.section_title: Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location and very friendly staff
thread.title_full: Perfect location and very friendly staff - Review of Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: WvH3008
title: Perfect location and very friendly staff
text: We stayed at Brighton hotel for two nights and were surprised by the very friendly staff, nicely equiped rooms, perfect location and view! The Brighton hotel is very close to Louvre and Place Vendome, surrounded by beautiful (and luxurious) shops.
